results.name: Captain Gazman Day Of The Rage

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card
  • VR Support: Too poor to implement this
  • Additional Notes: Use this black magic: "echo "5000" > /sys/class/drm/card0/engine/rcs0/preempt_timeout_ms" if the game crashes on start on systems with low amount of VRAM (tested on 128 MB Intel HD Graphics 505, works fine)
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer (Uwuntu 20.04 is supported too)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
  • VR Support: Too rich to implement this
  • Additional Notes: Probably will not run on Raspbian x86! Aarch64 is not supported too. Can run better than Windows version due to architecture differences. Gamepad support is limited on this platform (Xbox-compatibles only). Game is not working properly on 10xx/16XX NVidia GPUs (Pascal).

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 (technically - Windows Vista)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 3.30 GHz or AMD FX-4320 4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 (30 FPS)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card
  • VR Support: Too poor to implement this
  • Additional Notes: Not guaranteed to correctly work on laptops! Windows XP is not supported, it's 23 years old! We tested this on a crap laptop with 128 MB of VRAM and Intel HD Graphics 505, it runs here in, like, 10-15 fps. This means that if your GPU supports DrectX 11, the game will run, but we can't sure that it will run good. DirectX 10 support will be implemented later. Also this game is VERY CPU-intensive. Will not work on GPUs with 32 MB VRAM or less due to specifics of the texture pool calculation.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB (60 FPS)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
  • VR Support: Too rich to implement this
  • Additional Notes: Not guaranteed to correctly work on laptops! Not tested on Windows 11 yet. Developed with SSD in mind. Supports Intel XESS and AMD FSR (no DLSS or MetalFX sadly). Also this game is VERY CPU-intensive.
